channel.title: cs.SC updates on arXiv.org

item.title: Recursive matrix algorithms, distributed dynamic control, scaling, stability
item.description: arXiv:2501.05318v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The report is devoted to the concept of creating block-recursive matrix algorithms for computing on a supercomputer with distributed memory and dynamic decentralized control.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: 2019 Computer Science and Information Technologies (CSIT), Yerevan, Armenia, 2019, pp. 112-115
item.dc:creator: Gennadi Malaschonok
